entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Old Crow
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
